name: I Hate This Game - 1bit
description:
I'm N. Your Hero. Crawling dungeons, slashing monsters, marrying princesses. Day by day the same 'fun'. I'm tired and bored. And who cares? I hate this game.


Digital Rubbish Manufacture

presents

I Hate This Game - 1bit

a game about negative emotions


Click out your anger.


How to play

Press left mouse button. Should be quite easy. Not enough? Try to find more.

Play modes

- Normal. Just play.
